channel.title: Announcements on Odin
channel.description: Recent content in Announcements on Odin

item.title: 2020 Model Runs Are Up
item.description: Model runs for the 2020 year are up! It took about 2 hours for my laptop to chug through running the models, generating maps, and uploading everything, and I triggered my Google Cloud activity alert. But it was a good test of my automation scripts, and everything seems to have gone well! Check them out on the Hurricane page.
